Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Chief of the Palestinian National Authority Mahmoud Abbas on the occasion of the New Year Juche 96 (2007).
 It was handed to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Mohammad Shahta Zarab on Monday.
